name: claude-code-harness
description: A harness for solo developers (Vibecoders) to handle full-cycle contract development.
author: Manus AI & Chachamaru

commands.name: /plan
commands.description: Create a project plan and proposal for clients.

commands.name: /crud
commands.description: Generate CRUD endpoints with validation and authorization.

commands.name: /ci-setup
commands.description: Set up CI/CD with GitHub Actions.

commands.name: /deploy-setup
commands.description: Automate deployment to Vercel or Netlify.

commands.name: /component
commands.description: Integrate shadcn/ui components and ensure responsiveness.

commands.name: /auth
commands.description: Integrate authentication with Clerk or Supabase Auth.

commands.name: /review
commands.description: Review code from a Vibecoder's perspective.

commands.name: /auto-fix
commands.description: Automatically fix issues found in reviews.

commands.name: /analytics
commands.description: Integrate analytics with Google Analytics or Vercel Analytics.

commands.name: /work
commands.description: Implement features based on the plan.
